title: Developer – Robotic Process Automation – UiPath
description:
December 8, 2025
Full Time
Sweden
Posted 14 hours ago
We are hiring **Developer – Robotic Process Automation – UiPath**for the position based in **Stockholm/Malmö/Älmhult (Sweden)**


**Educational Qualification:** Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Network Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent professional experience.


**Job Summary:**



We are seeking a **Developer – Robotic Process Automation – UiPath** to lead testing efforts for RPA automation projects. This role requires strong hands-on UiPath expertise combined with leadership to design test strategies, ensure end-to-end RPA workflow quality, and drive continuous improvement across functional, integration, and regression testing.



**Required Experience/Competences:**


* Strong hands-on experience with **UiPath Studio, Orchestrator, and Robot configuration**.
* In-depth knowledge of **UiPath testing** framework and automation lifecycle.
* Proficiency in manual and **automation** testing methodologies.
* Experience with **test management tools** (JIRA, HP ALM).
* Understanding of SDLC and STLC processes.
* UiPath certification (Advanced RPA Developer or equivalent) preferred.


**Soft Skills:**


* Excellent communication and documentation skills.
* Strong problem-solving and analytical mindset.
### **Job Features**


Job Category Software Development

title: Dynamics CRM utvecklare till Unionens IT-enhet
description:
Är du en engagerad och driven utvecklare som vill bidra till innovativa och tekniska lösningar. Om du brinner för teknik och att skapa effektiva lösningar är detta ett jobb för dig.



Som Dynamics 365-utvecklare kommer du att spela en central roll i att utveckla, implementera och optimera Dynamics 365-lösningar för vår verksamhet. Hos Unionen får du möjligheten att vara en viktig del av vår digitaliseringsresa, där vi utvecklar och optimerar våra Dynamics 365-lösningar för att skapa ännu bättre processer för Sveriges största fackförbund.



Inom sektionen Digital utveckling finns ansvar för utvecklingsintensiva IT-tjänster kring medlems- och ärendehantering, digitala kanallösningar, Business Intelligence med mera. Funktionerna samarbetar tätt tillsammans inom enheten samt med verksamhet och leverantör.



Vi ser fram emot att förstärka vårt team med ytterligare en duktig kollega som vill hjälpa oss framåt.



Unionen erbjuder dig ett professionellt, meningsfullt, och utvecklande arbete som förbättrar för samhället, medlemmen och vår organisation.

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
-------------------



Tillsammans förvaltar vi och vidareutvecklar vår plattform för att möta verksamhetens behov och skapa framtidssäkrade digitala lösningar.



Vi arbetar prioriterat med informationssäkerhet och harmonisering av vår tekniska arkitektur



Du kommer att arbeta i ett engagerat utvecklingsteam som består av utvecklare, arkitekter, test & utvecklingsledare. Teamet består av både konsulter och anställda på Unionen där vi jobbar nära verksamheten.



Som Dynamics 365-utvecklare kommer du att:


* Utveckla och optimera våra Dynamics 365 CRM-lösningar.
* Stötta verksamheten genom felsökning av eskalerade ärenden
* Bygga integrationer med externa system via API:er, Power Platform och Azure.
* Bidra med teknisk expertis vid kravställning och lösningsdesign.

  


**Vem är du?**
--------------



Vi söker dig som har följande;


* Minst 2 års erfarenhet av utveckling i Dynamics 365 CRM
* God kunskap av C# och JavaScript/TypeScript
* Är bekant med API:er och integrationsverktyg och har tidigare erfarenhet av Azure-tjänster eller Power Platform
* Erfarenhet av att jobba i agila team


Du behöver vara strukturerad och lösningsorienterad och gilla att utveckla och att utvecklas. Du jobbar operativt men tänker strategiskt och strävar efter ständig förbättring. Du trivs i en miljö med hög förändringstakt och med många kontaktytor i din arbetsvardag. Du är en teamspelare men kan samtidigt arbeta självständigt för att nå målen för området.



Vi lägger stor vikt vid att du har en god problemlösarförmåga och trivs att arbeta i team.



Du kommunicerar flytande i svenska och engelska både muntligen och skriftligen.

  


**Det här gör jobbet roligt hos oss:**
--------------------------------------


* Du får arbeta med teknik som gör skillnad.
* Du blir en del av ett team som värdesätter samarbete och kunskapsdelning.
* Du får möjlighet att påverka och utveckla framtidens digitala lösningar.

  


**Omfattning**
--------------



Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid, med tillträde enligt överenskommelse. Provanställning kan tillämpas. Månadslön och goda villkor enligt kollektivavtal.



Kontoret, på Olof Palmes gata, är vår primära arbetsplats och visst arbete kan även utföras från hemmet eller annan plats.

  


**Ansökan**
-----------



Välkommen med din ansökan senast 20.e januari 2026. Intervjuer sker löpande vilket innebär att tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag löpt ut.



I din ansökan vill vi att du inkluderar ett motivationsbrev där du berättar vad som lockar dig med tjänsten som Utvecklare på Unionen. Motivationsbrevet ersätter det vanliga personliga brevet och ger dig chansen att förklara varför du tycker tjänsten är intressant. Du kan antingen lägga till en motiverande text direkt i din CV eller bifoga motivationsbrevet under "Personligt brev" i ansökningsformuläret.



Unionen välkomnar olikheteter i personalgrupperna och eftersträvar mångfald i alla avseenden.

  


**Kontakt**
-----------



Jörgen Westerberg, Sektionschef, jorgen.westerberg@unionen.se, 08-50415585



Elahe Sharifi, Fackligt ombud, elahe.sharifi@unionen.se, 08-50415430

  


**Om Unionen**
--------------



Vill du få kraft att göra skillnad?



Unionen är Sveriges största fackförbund på den privata arbetsmarknaden och landets största tjänstemannaförbund. Vår vision är att skapa trygghet, framgång och glädje i arbetslivet. Vi har inflytande, ansvar och ambition för mer än bara oss själva, och mod att driva frågor som påverkar hela samhället. Varje dag hjälper vi flest människor i det privata arbetslivet att få det bättre på arbetsplatsen. Därför har vi erfarenhet och bredd som ingen annan har, och vi behöver dig som vill göra oss ännu bättre.



Unionen finns i allt från stora internationella koncerner till små familjeföretag, organisationer och föreningar. Unionen är en medlemsstyrd organisation byggd på representativ demokrati. Vi är omkring 700 000 medlemmar. Cirka 29 000 är förtroendevalda över 16 000 arbetsplatser. Läs mer på www.unionen.se

title: Utvecklare inom Nätverk och Säkerhet - Sectra Communications
description:
Vill du arbeta med cybersäkerhet och utveckla innovativa lösningar som skyddar känslig information? Inom Enterprise Mobile Security hos Sectra Communications får du möjligheten att utveckla säkerhetsapplikationer som används av myndigheter, offentlig sektor och säkerhetsorganisationer – inklusive Försvarsmakten.
  
  

Sectra Communications är en ledande leverantör inom cybersäkerhet och informationssäkerhet. Sedan 40 år tillbaka arbetar vi med teknologi som gör skillnad och bidrar till att skapa ett säkrare samhälle, både i Sverige och Europa.
  
  

Inom vår enhet Enterprise Mobile Security (EMS), tillhandahåller vi produkter som hanterar information för säkerhetsnivån Restricted. Hos oss får du arbeta med avancerad cybersäkerhetsteknik och bygga system som kombinerar hög säkerhet med smidig användarupplevelse.
  
  

Vi arbetar agilt i små team där kunskapsöverföring är en naturlig del av vardagen. Du får möjlighet att påverka arkitektur, design och funktionalitet samtidigt som du utvecklas tillsammans med erfarna kollegor.
  
  

Rollen
  
  

**I rollen kommer du att:**  

Utveckla vår VPN-klient för Windows och/eller gatewaylösning i Linuxmiljö
  
Implementera och optimera nätverksprotokoll, autentisering och kryptering för högsta säkerhetsnivå
  
Arbeta med prestantaförbättringar, felsökning och integration i komplexa nätverksmiljöer
  
Delta i design av arkitektur och bidra med idéer kring robusthet och användarvänlighet
  
Samarbeta med experter inom nätverk och säkerhet för att skapa lösningar som används i samhällsviktiga system
  
  

**Tekniker:**  

Windows-klientutveckling (C++, C#)
  
Linux Backend (C, C++, Python, Bash)
  
Nätverksprotokoll (TCP/IP, IPSec, VPN)
  
Kryptering och autentiseringstekniker
  
CI/CD, Git, Docker
  
Kvalifikationer
  
  

Sectras motto ”Hire for attitude and ability. Train for skill” innebär att vi lägger tyngre vikt i vem du är och din potential än den kunskap och erfarenhet du besitter idag. De egenskaper vi vill se hos våra anställda är viljan och förmågan att lära sig samt att kunna ta sig an nya uppgifter och utmaningar snabbt. Med dessa egenskaper kan vi lära dig det som krävs för tjänsten och för att utveckla dina kunskaper.
  
  

**Utöver detta ser vi att du har:**  

En MSc eller BSc inom exempelvis datateknik, systemvetenskap eller liknande.
  
Goda kunskaper inom programmering.
  
En vilja att lära av andra och dela med dig av dina egna kunskaper.
  
Flytande kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
  
Svenskt medborgarskap (ett krav då vi jobbar med säkerhetsklassad information).
  
  

**Det är meriterande om du har:**  

Kompetens inom nätverk, Android eller iOS.
  
Erfarenhet av Windows systemprogrammering, systemanrop och OS-integration.
  
Kunskaper i Java, Kotlin, C, C++ eller C#.
  
Goda studieresultat och/eller engagemang utanför studierna.
  
Intressen utanför skola och jobb som visar på driv och initiativförmåga.
  
  

Varför Sectra Communications?
  
  

Hos oss blir du en del av ett team med drivna, smarta och empatiska kollegor som brinner för teknik och säkerhet. Vi har en kultur där samverkan och innovation står i fokus, och där vi ständigt utmanar oss själva för att utveckla ännu bättre lösningar. Du får även:
  
  

Möjligheten till distans- och hybridarbete, vilket är ovanligt i vår bransch
  
Arbeta med teknik som är avgörande för våra kunders säkra lösningar
  
En kultur där kunskapsdelning och samarbete står i centrum
  
Möjlighet att växa, oavsett om du är expert eller nybörjare med ambition
  
Spännande projekt med stor påverkan och högteknisk nivå
  
  

Låter det intressant? Hör av dig – vi ser igenom ansökningar och kallar till intervju löpande. Du kan läsa mer om vår rekryteringsprocess här.
  
  

Vi har riktigt bra förmåner
  
  

Göra skillnad
  
  

Personlig utveckling
  
  

Global miljö
  
  

Grymma kollegor
  
  

Innovation och teknologi
  
  

Kundfokus
  
  

Om företaget
  
  

Sectra develops and sells cutting-edge solutions for medical IT and cybersecurity. We help hospitals and those who are training future healthcare personnel to improve their efficiency so that patients can receive better care. We also support and help defense, authorities, and critical social functions to secure their communication against eavesdropping and protect their systems against unauthorized access. This is how we create conditions for a healthier and safer society.
  
  

One thing that identifies us at Sectra is our customer obsession— our ability and willingness to understand, create value for and stand up for our customers. This shared priority is at the core of our culture. Our customers describe this as having the knowledge to meet expectations, the passion to exceed them. As we hire for attitude and ability - train for skill, we happily expand your knowledge, if you bring the passion and willingness to learn.

title: Junior Frontend Developer
description:
About Niora
 

  






 Niora is a fast-growing player in subscription automation for B2B companies. We’re challenging an outdated way of working, where finance teams still juggle contracts, spreadsheets, and invoicing manually by building smart, AI-driven tools that just work.
 





 Our vision is to eliminate the friction between a signed contract and a paid invoice. We give finance teams their time back while helping businesses get paid faster and more accurately. With strong customer focus and a fully digital product, we’re making subscription management simpler, smarter, and scalable.
 




  






 We’re early in our journey and that’s exactly what makes this exciting.
 




  





 Description
 

  






 As a Junior Frontend Engineer at Niora, you will implement
 

 user-focused experiences web applications
 

 . This is a hands-on engineering role where you take responsibility for the full chain from feature development to monitoring of deployments in production. You will work closely with the design team and convert
 

 high-fidelity designs into pixel-perfect components
 

 .
 




  





 What you will do
 

  




* Collaborate closely with developers and designers in continuous release cycles, driven by user feedback and business development
* Optimize application performance and troubleshoot scalability



  





 Who you are
 

  






 You are a self-driven problem solver who takes initiative and pride in the impact you make on the business of the company. You are a team player with a product focus and enjoy a dynamic and fast paced environment. You have experience with production and can navigate the challenges involved in providing continuity and quality to the users. You stay up to date with the latest innovations.
 




  





 Requirements
 

  




* At least 2 years of professional experience in frontend development (React/next.js and TypeScript)
* Experience with restful API design and integrations
* Experience with deployment to production
* Good knowledge of Figma as a communication tool with designers
* Embrace AI in your workflow
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
* Fluent in English (and preferably in Swedish as well)
* Already based in Stockholm



  





 Bonus points
 

  




* Experience with tailwindcss
* Enjoy the controlled chaos a startup can be at times

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
About Niora
 

  






 Niora is a fast-growing player in subscription automation for B2B companies. We’re challenging an outdated way of working, where finance teams still juggle contracts, spreadsheets, and invoicing manually by building smart, AI-driven tools that just work.
 





 Our vision is to eliminate the friction between a signed contract and a paid invoice. We give finance teams their time back while helping businesses get paid faster and more accurately. With strong customer focus and a fully digital product, we’re making subscription management simpler, smarter, and scalable.
 




  






 We’re early in our journey and that’s exactly what makes this exciting.
 




  





 Description
 

  






 As a Senior fullstack Engineer at Niora, you will work across cloud infrastructure, backend services, frontends and third parties integrations. This is a hands-on engineering role where you take responsibility for the full chain from feature development to monitoring of deployments in production. You will work with our CTO and play a role in discussions about the technical direction of the company.
 




  





 What you will do
 

  




* Collaborate closely with developers and designers in continuous release cycles, driven by user feedback and business development
* Observe health and metrics of the systems in production
* Optimize application performance and troubleshoot scalability
* Assist with architectural and infrastructure decisions



  





 Who you are
 

  






 You are a self-driven problem solver who takes initiative and pride in the impact you make on the business of the company. You are a team player with a product focus and enjoy a dynamic and fast paced environment. You have experience with production and can navigate the challenges involved in providing continuity and quality to the users. You stay up to date with the latest innovations.
 




  





 Requirements
 

  




* At least 5 years of experience in backend development (.NET, postgres)
* Solid experience with React frontends (next.js)
* Experience with cloud native and distributed applications (AWS)
* Master software engineering best practices for security and quality assurance
* Strong understanding of the long term value created by tests and automation
* Embrace AI in your workflow.
* Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
* Fluent in English (and preferably in Swedish as well)
* Already based in Stockholm



  





 Bonus points
 

  




* Experience with integration of LLMs in real world applications
* Experience with data-intensive applications
* Enjoy the controlled chaos a startup can be at times

title: Frontend Developer
description:
NoA Ignite seeks a Frontend Developer with a passion for the craft and keen attention to detail, mastering new technologies and thriving within the modern frontend stack (TypeScript, React.js, Next.js).
 



  





 Work alongside top industry minds on bold, large-scale projects for clients such as Coop and SEB, as well as leading lifestyle brands like Klättermusen and Svenskt Tenn.
 



  





 You will join an experienced and ambitious team that enjoys working closely together, sharing ideas, and creating an atmosphere where people have fun together.
 



  





**Key Requirements** 



* Thorough understanding of UI development, including solid, hands-on expertise in modern CSS that extends beyond framework conventions.
* Strong drive to explore emerging tools and approaches, with analytical skills to evaluate technical impact for clients.
* Experience working with e-commerce solutions or online retail projects is highly valued.
* Proven experience optimising performance, implementing caching strategies, and managing deployment pipelines.



  





**Your Impact** 




 Self-driven, proactive, and contributing to refining internal tools, processes, and practices. You collaborate with teams to deliver high-quality, cost-effective solutions while staying ahead of trends in performance, hosting, and caching. You influence framework adoption to help push innovative, enjoyable digital experiences forward.
 



  





**Why NoA Ignite?** 



* Technically curious: We bring together engineering, design, and insight to build thoughtful, reliable platforms.
* Strong network: Your ideas are supported by specialists across NoA, giving you access to a wide range of expertise.
* Skilled colleagues & meaningful clients: Work with experienced teams on projects that have real impact.
* Room to grow: Develop your skills through challenging assignments and supportive, collaborative teams.



  





**Our Recruitment Process** 




 Skip the cover letter and CV — share your LinkedIn, GitHub or portfolio link, and answer a few quick questions. We look forward to hearing from you.

title: Senior .NET Developer
description:
*Global migration is a 21st-century reality. Whether people are fleeing from something or racing towards better opportunity, following love or seeking new experiences, more and more are living in different environments and in new ways. We celebrate the power of people coming together. That’s why we connect ambitious people abroad with their families and friends back home so they can support each other emotionally and financially, and lead more enriched lives.*
**Why Rebtel?**
 At Rebtel, we build complex, high-performing applications that power global communication. Our backend development is structured yet flexible—an environment where agility, creativity, and technical excellence are not just encouraged but expected. We maintain an agile workflow, prioritize clean, maintainable code through regular refactoring, and champion knowledge-sharing through code reviews. If you're looking for challenging problems that will stretch your skills and ignite your creativity, you’ll feel right at home.
   

  

**About You**
 As a Senior .NET Developer who not only loves solving complex problems but is passionate about code quality, and building scalable and testable solutions.
   

  

 You’ll be adequately self going, contribute to technical discussions, and aspire to deliver clean, robust code. You have a sharp eye for simplicity amidst complexity and pride yourself on thorough, thoughtful development—including writing tests for critical components. Whether working closely within your team or leading a project area independently, you’re confident, collaborative, and proactive.
   

  

**Requirements**
* Expertise in .NET Core, .NET Framework, and related technologies (e.g., ASP.NET)
* Strong knowledge of both SQL (MSSQL) and document-oriented databases like MongoDB
* Hands-on experience with DevOps practices and deployment tools (Git, Azure DevOps)
* Practical knowledge of containerization using Kubernetes
* Experience integrating with GraphQL and REST APIs
* Excellent communication skills in English
* We don’t evaluate skills by number, however we believe ideally you should have worked at least 7+ years to gain the right seniority
* Passionate about writing clean, structured, and testable code
* Puts really high weight on test coverage of their code
* Elevates the performance and mindset of the team around them
* Naturally curious, loves experimenting with new technologies
* Strategic vision for product and codebase growth


**Our Offer To You**
**Benefits**
 At Rebtel, you are the most important asset and we strive to provide a comprehensive package of benefits and perks that enhance your well-being and work experience. Here are some of the things you can expect from us:
   

  

* Pension Plan
* Health Checkups and Private Medical Insurance
* 10k Bucket (net) for wellness allowance and Travel (benefit taxed)
* Discount on gym memberships
* Bonus program
* Parental pay
* 30 days annual vacation
* Relocation Support, if you're joining us from afar, we'll assist you in making a smooth transition.


 Rebtel is an international workplace, and at the office, we speak English; therefore, high English proficiency is required.
   

  

*We are Rebtel. We come from all around the world to create products for anyone who has crossed a border. We believe in equal opportunity and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.*
 Global migration is a 21st-century reality. Whether people are fleeing from something or racing towards better opportunity, following love or seeking new experiences, more and more are living in different environments and in new ways. We celebrate the power of people coming together. That’s why we connect ambitious people abroad with their families and friends back home so they can support each other emotionally and financially, and lead more enriched lives.
   

  

 Our ambitious team reflects our international audience. We are a diverse group of people from all over the world that come together every day—and we’re looking for others driven by the same desire to create meaningful products that bridge cultural and geographic distances.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description:
**We’re looking for an accomplished developer with experience in all aspects of building web applications to help us create the best video commerce platform on the market.** 




  





 The Bambuser Research & Development department builds the world’s best video-based shopping solutions, using our pioneering in-house live video platform continuously developed over the last 17 years. We have a long legacy of quality engineering in this space.
 



 As a Bambuser team member, you will have the opportunity to contribute at the forefront of the emerging market that is video commerce. You will have a chance to work both individually and in close collaboration with others on projects in the challenging environment of real-time live video applications. You will join a group of highly skilled engineers including top open source contributors and world-class experts in their respective fields.
 



 Our philosophy is to build robustly, scalably, and securely for the future, emphasizing quality and practicality, without over-engineering. We ship early and often, and learn from our experiences.
 



  





**What you will do** 




 In the role of Full Stack Web Developer, you will develop, deploy, and maintain the frontend and backend of one or more of our web applications in use by millions of people worldwide.
 



 Opportunities to show off your skills will vary across projects, and may include for example: designing the high-performance caching strategies for high-volume APIs, building React applications from scratch, or optimizing GitLab CI/CD deployment pipelines.
 



  





**Who you are** 



* You have at least 5 years working as a Full Stack Developer, Software Engineer, or similar role.
* You have at least 3 years experience building, deploying, and maintaining both the frontend and backend of modern web applications.
* You have at least 2 years experience working extensively in JavaScript/TypeScript code bases.
* You have strong problem-solving skills and the ability to debug complex issues effectively.
* You have a solid understanding of the uses and limitations of the standard building blocks of web services, e.g. REST, databases (relational and document), caches, message queues, serverless/server-based, transfer protocols, etc.
* You have a strongly rooted security mindset and the proclivity to build securely by default.
* You have experience collaborating with other developers in shared code bases, acting as a reviewer for others as well as having the ability to structure and explain your own code changes concisely.
* You have a proven ability to plan, execute, and complete development projects, both independently and in collaboration with others.
* You know when it's the right time to accept technical debt and when it's time to pay it off.



  





**Nice to haves** 



* Experience building B2B SaaS platforms
* Experience building enterprise services
* Experience working in start-up or scale-up businesses



  





**Toolkit** 



* Google Cloud Platform (Firebase, Firestore, AppEngine, Cloud Functions, PubSub, Memorystore, etc.)
* Amazon Web Services (EC2, CloudFront, S3, Lambda, RDS, Route53, Elastic Beanstalk, SQS, ElastiCache, etc.)
* MariaDB/MySQL, PostgreSQL, BigQuery
* JavaScript/TypeScript (Node.js, React, Webpack)
* HTTP Live Streaming (HLS), WebRTC, WebSocket
* Bash/Dash, Docker, Git, GitLab
* WooCommerce and Shopify for demo sites
* Gemini CLI, OpenAI APIs, Lovable, Cursor



*While we welcome applications from everywhere, please note that at this stage we are prioritizing candidates who are already based in Stockholm and eligible to work in Sweden without visa sponsorship.* 




  





**Curious to see Bambuser in action?** 




 Check out bambuser.com to explore how our platform powers shoppable video for brands worldwide. You’ll find product demos (Live, Shoppable Video, Video Consultation and Chat) and stories from some of the world’s most iconic retailers. If you’re excited about shaping the future of video commerce, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and join us on the journey! 🚀
 



  





*This job ad was written by a human (alleged).*

title: Unity Developer Intern [Remote]
description:
**About XR Solutions** 




 XR Solutions is a technology-driven company pioneering
 **machine learning-powered augmented reality solutions** 
 for industrial clients.
 



 Our mission is to revolutionize how machines are operated, maintained, and optimized — enabling workflows and innovations that were once impossible. We combine research-based optimizations with cutting-edge AR technology to create
 **practical, reliable, and high-performance solutions** 
 that reshape industries.
 



 This internship offers a rare opportunity to
 **build backend systems that directly power advanced AR applications** 
 used in real-world industrial environments.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




 We’re looking for a
 **passionate, detail-oriented Unity Developer Intern** 
 with a strong interest in XR interaction and immersive technologies.
 



 While the internship is
 **initially unpaid** 
 , outstanding performance could lead to a
 **future paid opportunity** 
 .
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 



* Collaborate with developers on
 **XR features** 
 and infrastructure
* Design, develop, and test interactive UI/UX for AR applications
* Integrate and support backend systems and services
* Conduct research into AR technologies, including hardware like
 **HMDs**
* Contribute to product design and optimization ahead of our first pilot launch
* Help solve complex, real-world challenges using cutting-edge tools



  





**What You’ll Gain** 



* Hands-on experience building XR applications used in industry
* Deep exposure to
 **Unity** 
 ,
 **ARKit** 
 , and backend systems integration
* Real-world application of UI/UX principles in immersive environments
* Insight into the full development lifecycle of AR products
* A chance to work on a product preparing for its first commercial deployment
* Experience in a collaborative, startup-style tech environment



  





**What We’re Looking For** 



* Proficiency in
 **Unity** 
 and
 **ARKit**
* Proficiency in
 **C#**
* Experience with
 **3D modeling** 
 tools (e.g., Blender, Maya)
* Knowledge of
 **Figma** 
 for UI/UX design
* Passion for XR, AR, and immersive technologies
* Familiarity with
 **Xcode** 
 and
 **HMDs** 
 (head-mounted displays) is a plus



  





  





 If you’re excited about this opportunity and eager to learn, please send your resume outlining your interest in the position. We look forward to helping you grow your skills and advance your career in backend development.

title: Gaming- Senior .NET Engineer
description:
Are you an experienced Senior Backend .NET/C# Engineer looking for your next career opportunity? The Gaming Area within Product Development is now hiring! The Gaming Area at Betsson Group focuses on Game Play and Game Discovery across all our brands and markets. We aim to offer the best gaming products in the industry and an exciting user experience when playing on our sites. We cover game lobbies, gaming initiatives, provider integrations and more.  
 


  

**THE WOW** 
  


 Our Gaming platform is the core of everything we do. It supports all our gaming sites and is central to the company strategy.
 


  


 You will be part of preparing our journey to containerization, increasing the scalability of our systems while also maintaining their high quality. To accommodate new requirements, we are constantly re-evaluating our systems design and working on exciting new features. You will be part of a passionate team, which is building an industry leading, scalable, multi-brand platform to support 25+ online brands! Our brands are used by hundreds of thousands of users and growing
 


  


 To sum it up you will be taking our Gaming platform, which is used by a worldwide audience, to a new level!  
 


  

**SOME OF THE THINGS THAT WE WOULD LIKE TO SEE** 
  


 Previous experience as a backend developer and relevant experience with some of the core technical skills mentioned below. You are a collaborative person who readily offers help and shares knowledge with your colleagues.
 


  

  
* C#, .NET, NET Core
  
* SQL Server and NoSQL databases
  
* Unit testing frameworks
  
* Messaging within a micro service architecture
  
* Agile development
  


  


 And/or to have experience working with kafka, a modern front-end framework (e.g. Angular), Docker containerization, Domain driven design.
 


  





  

 What’s in it for you?
   


 We can offer you an environment full of ambition and passion. One day is never like the other as the only constant is change, to the better, to the greater. We strive to be the best in whatever field we choose to play on, and we make sure to have fun along the way!
 


  

  
* A friendly, open and humble working environment, where you will have the chance to work alongside with colleagues from all over the world
  
* A chance to evolve your skills together with your colleagues with various programs and initiatives
  
* Personal development through courses, in-house training and external certification
  
* Freedom with responsibility
  


  

 CHALLENGE ACCEPTED?
   


 If you are interested to learn more, please apply with your CV in English.
 


  


 Check out the Betsson Group Blog to find out what our employees are talking about
 


  


 By submitting your application, you understand that your personal data will be processed as set out in our Privacy Policy

title: Mobile Developer (Kotlin)
description:
**Job Description**

**WHAT YOU’LL DO​**




 As a Mobile Developer, you'll ensure seamless and engaging experiences across smartphones, PCs, and other devices. Experience with multiple device types, payments, and iOS is highly valued. While Kotlin is the main language, JavaScript and TypeScript are also useful. Your work will cover POS sales, payments, back-office applications, mobile payments, self-checkout stations, and standout in-store payment solutions.
   

  





**WHO YOU’LL WORK WITH**




 At Store Lens, we work closely with Portfolio Brands and H&M Brand to design and provide technical solutions. We contribute to product development at every stage, from setting requirements to rollout and testing. From day one, we focus on improving by listening, building, and refining as we go. Even as we define requirements, we are already thinking ahead, using early designs, first developments, and new learnings to continuously make the product better.
   

  





 We are curious, active listeners and hands-on doers.
   

  





 Beyond your work with Store Lens, you will also be part of our Engineering community, where you will have access to a network of experts, resources, and opportunities to grow.
   

  





**WHO YOU ARE​**




 We are looking for people with…​
   

  




* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent experience), and at least 5-8 years of experience as a Software Engineer with mobile and front end focus.
* Proficiency in Android development in Kotlin.
* Proficiency in build secure applications with Microsoft Login and Single Sign-On capabilities.
* Experience in mobile development for multiple devices.
* Experience Integrate hardware and communicate effectively with Android applications.
* Experience to work with SDKs from external vendors.
* Experience in Consume web services (e.g., REST APIs).
* Collaborate with UX/UI designers and utilize Figma for design implementation.
* Experience of CI/ CD pipelines using Azure DevOps / GitHub Actions.
* Knowledge and apply basic Mobile Device Management (MDM) principles (e.g., Airwatch).
* Experience in POS, Payment and Checkout area is a plus.
* IOS development, experience is a plus.
* Apply basic web development skills is a plus.



*And people who have* 
 :
   

  




* Continuous learning mindset to stay updated on emerging trends and technologies in backend testing.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment and communicate technical concepts clearly.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Experience conducting code reviews, identifying areas of improvement, and provide constructive feedback to maintain code quality and consistency.
* Familiarity in backend testing with a focus on ensuring the reliability and performance of backend systems.
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum development methodologies.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.


**Additional Information**

**WHO WE ARE** 
 ​
   

  





 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.​
   

  





 ​We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future. ​
   

  





**​WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE** 
 ​
   

  





 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  





 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.
   

  





**JOIN US​** 
  

  





 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.​
   

  





 ​Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.​
   

  





 ​
 *\*We are committed to a recruitment process that is fair, equitable, and based on competency. We therefore kindly ask you to not attach a cover letter in your application.​*

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
**Xensam: Join the Future of SAM** 




 Xensam is the leader in AI-powered, cloud-based Software Asset Management. Our technology brings clarity to complex IT environments, helping users make smart, data-driven decisions and maximize software ROI.
 



  





 Recognized with the Highest Growth Award and ranked #3 Overall Champion at the Main Software 50 Awards Nordics, we’re scaling fast and looking for people who want to join the journey. At Xensam, you play a key role in a team built on energy, focus, and positivity. We value experience, but even more, the person behind it.
 



  





 Together, we build the future of SAM.
 



  





**About The Role** 




 As our Senior Frontend Developer at Xensam in Stockholm, you will work hands-on and become a proactive technical leader with a strong drive to solve complex problems. You’ll contribute across the entire product portfolio and support the team by providing technical guidance and stepping in wherever your expertise is needed.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 




 You will design, develop, debug, test, and enhance high-quality frontend features and integrations using JavaScript and TypeScript. You will collaborate closely with UX Designers, Product Owners, backend, and database developers to deliver great user experiences and ensure accessibility. Furthermore you will:
 


* Take ownership of the technical direction for frontend development, drive architectural decisions, and act as the go-to person for technical guidance during planning, estimation, and reviews.
* Guide the technical execution of projects, ensuring alignment with product goals, scalability requirements, and timely delivery.
* Ensure best practices across development, including CI/CD pipelines, code structure, testing strategies, and maintain high standards for code quality and performance.
* Apply modern security best practices and OWASP guidelines across all development activities.
* Promote engineering excellence by reviewing peers’ work, providing constructive feedback, enforcing best practices, and mentor junior developers.



  





**Qualifications** 



* 5+ years of experience in frontend development, including debugging, testing, and optimizing modern web applications.
* Strong proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript, with deep experience in React and state management libraries such as MobX.
* Solid understanding of frontend architecture, asynchronous programming patterns, and REST API integration.
* Proficient in Git or similar version control systems, and experienced with utility-first CSS frameworks like Tailwind.
* Strong knowledge of secure coding, authentication protocols (OIDC, JWT), and error handling.
* Good understanding of relational databases and frontend-backend interaction.
* Familiar with Agile methodologies and working in Agile/Scrum teams.
* Experience mentoring, reviewing code, and upholding high standards.
* Comfortable leading technical discussions, architectural decisions, and owning frontend initiatives.
* Good communication skills and a strong proficiency in written and spoken English.
* Preferably a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.



  





**Bonus Points If You** 



* Have a full-stack background, working across both frontend and backend development.



  





**What You Get** 



* A generous work culture with free drinks and snacks, office massages, and more.
* Three days in-office (with remote work on Mondays and Fridays).
* An opportunity to shape your career growth while contributing to the company’s success.
* A dynamic position embracing "freedom under responsibility".
* If sales targets are met, all employees enjoy an annual destination trip.
* Other location-specific benefits.



  





**Our values at Xensam** 




**Rebellious** 




 We challenge the norm and act with initiative – always with responsibility.
 



**Humane** 




 We foster a caring, inclusive environment that values diversity and respects individuality.
 



**Harmony** 




 We value balance and create a supportive workplace where people thrive.
 



  





 As part of our recruitment process, we conduct background checks on final candidates to fulfill our commitments to customers and ensure a safe work environment.

title: Systemutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 8 års arbetslivserfarenhet av att designa och utveckla mikrotjänster på Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) i Java, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, Spring Security, Gradleoch med Oracle DB (SQL Developer) som databas
* Minst 8 års år att designa och utveckla backend APIer för Frontend "Single Page Applications" (e-tjänster)
* Minst 7 år att designa och utveckla backend APIer som producent med hjälp av Swagger/OpenAPI för integrationer med andra backendtjänster
* Minst 7 år att designa och utveckla integrationer som konsument i ett komplext ekosystem
* Minst 7 år utveckla automatiserade tester såsom enhets-, integration- och komponenttester med hjälp av JUnit och SpringBootTest


**Meriterande**
* Flerårig aktuell och dokumenterad erfarenhet av livscykelhantering såsom uppgraderingar av Java, Spring Boot och Gradle
* Flerårig aktuell och dokumenterad erfarenhet konfiguration och administration av Red
* Hat OpenShift Container Platform (OCP)
* Flerårig aktuell och dokumenterad erfarenhet konfiguration av Grafana för att kunna monitorera applikationen i olika miljöer
* Arbetslivserfarenhet från myndighet med minst 10 000 medarbetare.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 12-12-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Business Developer
description:
**⭐️️ Examen 2026? Kickstarta din karriär och gör skillnad på riktigt!** 




 Vill du jobba med innovativ teknik som räddar liv? Crystal Alarm söker nu en Business Developer som vill vara med och bygga framtidens trygghetslösningar och samtidigt ta nästa steg i sin karriär. Detta är en perfekt möjlighet för dig som tar examen 2026 och letar efter en roll där du får utvecklas.
 



  





**Om oss** 




 Crystal Alarm är ett svenskt security-techbolag som utvecklar smarta och användarvänliga personlarm. Våra SaaS-lösningar används av över 16 000 användare hos bland annat SJ, ICA och Trygg Hansa, för att skapa tryggare arbetsmiljöer varje dag. Med innovation och samhällsnytta i fokus bidrar vi varje dag till en tryggare arbetsmiljö för tusentals människor över hela Sverige. Just nu står vi även inför en spännande resa med internationell expansion och söker dig som vill vara med och utvecklas tillsammans med oss!
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Som Business Developer kommer du spela en central roll i vår tillväxtresa inom Sverige. Du kommer arbeta nära våra kunder och återförsäljare, driva affärer och skapa relationer – samtidigt som du bidrar till att fler människor känner trygghet på jobbet.
 



  





 Du kommer bland annat:
 


* Bygga nya samarbeten med återförsäljare och partners
* Stötta och utbilda återförsäljare i hur våra lösningar skapar värde
* Vårda kundrelationer och identifiera nya affärsmöjligheter
* Delta på mässor, event och nätverksträffar
* Vara en del av ett team som brinner för innovation, trygghet och samhällsnytta



  





**Vi tror att du…** 




 …är i början av din karriär och vill utvecklas inom försäljning. Du har en avslutad universitetsutbildning och viss erfarenhet av B2B-försäljning (SaaS eller tekniska produkter är meriterande). Som person är du kommunikativ, nyfiken och gillar att ta ansvar – men också att ha kul på vägen. Framför allt vill du växa i rollen, utvecklas och bidra till något som verkligen spelar roll.
 



  





**Vi erbjuder** 




 🚀 Möjligheten att bli en nyckelspelare i ett snabbväxande techbolag
 



 💡 Stort utrymme att påverka och utvecklas inom affärsutveckling och försäljning
 



 🌍 Ett meningsfullt jobb, där våra lösningar skyddar människor på riktigt
 



 🎉 Ett engagerat, stöttande team med entreprenörsanda
 



 📍 Centralt kontor i Stockholm, med närvaro primärt på plats för teamkänsla
 



  





**Om tjänsten** 



* Anställningsform: Tillsvidare (med inledande provanställning)
* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Omfattning: Heltid
* Plats: Gamla brogatan 32, Stockholm



  





 Läs mer om oss på www.crystalalarm.se.
